title: vAnulagu nIr
sahitya:
vAnulagu nIr tarumEl maNmIdu marangaL vaghai vaghaiyAi nerkkaL purkkaL malindirukkumanrO
anupallavi  mAnuDar uzhAviDinum vittu naDAviDinum varambu kaTTAviDinum anru nIr pAccAviDinum
caraNam  yAn edarkkum anjugilEn mAnuDarE nIvIr en madattai kaikkoLmin pADupaDal vENDA
UnuDalai varuttAdIr uNavu iyarkkai koDukkum ungaLukku tozhilingE anbu sheidal kaNDIr
